name: monaco-html-extra
description: HTML plugin for the Monaco Editor,Support javascript and css completion

scripts.compile: mrmdir ./out && mrmdir ./release && npm run copy-lib && tsc -p ./src/tsconfig.json && tsc -p ./src/tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: mrmdir ./release && npm run compile && node ./scripts/release.js && node ./scripts/bundle && mcopy ./src/monaco.d.ts ./release/monaco.d.ts
scripts.install-service-next: npm install vscode-html-languageservice@next -f -D && npm install vscode-css-languageservice@next -f -D && npm install vscode-languageserver-types@next -f -D

author: Microsoft Corporation
